subject: water fountains when you really need a water fountain
body:
_[everyone in this room will someday be dead](https://www.amazon.com/Everyone-This-Room-Will-Someday-ebook/dp/B08LDXW9Y2/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=everyone+in+this+room+will+someday+be+dead&qid=1627184385&sr=8-1)_, which i read in one sitting today and which i recommend especially to fans of _[milk fed](https://www.amazon.com/Milk-Fed-Novel-Melissa-Broder-ebook/dp/B08BZVV6ZF/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=milk+fed&qid=1627184334&sr=8-1)_ and _[the new me](https://www.amazon.com/New-Me-Halle-Butler-ebook/dp/B07DMZY1Z4/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=the+new+me&qid=1627184358&sr=8-1)_ and [an invisible sign of my own](https://www.amazon.com/Invisible-Sign-My-Own-Novel-ebook/dp/B005EGXSQ8/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=an+invisible+sign+of+my+own&qid=1627184433&sr=8-2)_._

ran 13.1 miles this morning on the route that partway through goes along the river, where spaghetti freeways and bridges intertwine in the air above me.

water fountains when you really need a water fountain

this morning f, trying to interest me in a game of fetch, literally flung her own toy in the air and then caught it (a thing which i have seen her do before, so not just some weird one-off)

listened to _abbey road_ on vinyl with d and she could identify john and paul on the cover but got george and ringo backward. the opportunity to share selections of the hundreds of pages of ephemera about the beatles that i ingested during my youth

fried chicken and biscuits for dinner

that though it is still hot even with the air conditioner on, i can just absolutely blast the fuck out of myself with a fan

ice in a drink in the summer (all the time but especially in the summer)

[this tweet](https://twitter.com/rad_milk/status/1416523646303051778) e sent me about digiorno

bong hits
